OOC: Yeah, I know, Ruaq told me, but I read a post saying that there was a base near what would be the rocky mountains. So I figured...anyway, I'll place his pod on the smaller of the two continents, but near the top.
Vampirtron:

     "AHHHHHH!!!!" Vampitron yelled as he hit the atmosphere of the prehistoric planet. He small ship crashed into the planet's surface and slid fifty feet. When the dust settled, the ship's top opened. A transformer walked out. He had no beast mode. A lone black wolf walked up to him, the robot grabbed it by the nap of it's neck and looked it over, "A suitable beast mode," He said. He pulled a needle from a small pack in his ship and stuck the wolf. He then dropped the wolf who ran away, obviously terrified. Vampirtron opened his chest and screwed the vial of blood into his systems. It was gone in a second. Vampitron unscrewed the vial and tossed it to the ground. He took two steps from his ship and underwent the changes.

     An hour later he awoke, in beast mode. He transformed back to robot mode, and opened a comm. Unfortunatly it only could reach about one hundred miles, so he may not meet anyone. He sent out this message.

     "Hello to any transformers out there," He said into the comm, very calmly. "My name is Vampirtron, I have crashed onto this planet and I request assistance from the nearest base. In return for help I will give you my ship."

     He found a big rock and sat down on it. Waiting...



---------------------------------
Do You Yahoo!?
Yahoo! Health - Feel better, live better
--0-418992339-1027556127=:96942

<P>Vampirtron:</P>

When the dust settled, the ship's top opened. A transformer walked out. He had no beast mode. A lone black wolf walked up to him, the robot grabbed it by the nap of it's neck and looked it over, "A suitable beast mode," He said. He pulled a needle from a small pack in his ship and stuck the wolf. He then dropped the wolf who ran away, obviously terrified. Vampirtron opened his chest and screwed the vial of blood into his systems. It was gone in a second. Vampitron unscrewed the vial and tossed it to the ground. He took two steps from his ship and underwent the changes.</P>
<P>     An hour later he awoke, in beast mode. He transformed back to robot mode, and opened a comm. Unfortunatly it only could reach about one hundred miles, so he may not meet anyone. He sent out this message.</P>
<P>     "Hello to any transformers out there," He said into the comm, very calmly. "My name is Vampirtron, I have crashed onto this planet and I request assistance from the nearest base. In return for help I will give you my ship."</P>
